timeline.message: Functional IG using TagSet and TagName

timeline.bodyText:
These method overloads were just added, right, so this is not a public API change?
It would be a good idea to update the param doc as well.
timeline.author: rcordovano

replies.bodyText: Yes, they are newly added in the previous PR.  Doc will be updated.
replies.author: kellykelly3

timeline.bodyText: If you do an instanceof, you won't need to suppress the warning.
timeline.author: rcordovano

replies.bodyText:
An instanceof is not enough. I even tried first an instancof List then getting the first item and checking that it is a DeletedContentTagInfo and the warning still appears.
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10108122/how-to-instanceof-listmytype
replies.author: kellykelly3

replies.bodyText: Bummer. Let's bite the bullet then and treat ourselves to a dedicated field, instead of using the super class oldValue field. Then we can override getOldValue and we can also provide a properly typed method to return the List. This is the alternate implementation strategy that I mentioned earlier - it appears we can use it here to avoid the warning suppression.
replies.author: rcordovano

timeline.bodyText: If you do an instanceof, you won't need to suppress the warning.
timeline.author: rcordovano

timeline.bodyText:
We should not have code going to the DrawableDB to get an ImageGalleryController reference. I recently went through some trouble to make sure that all (I think) ImageGalleryController references were handed out to the classes that needed them via their constructors using a reference obtained from a call to ImageGalleryController.getController that keeps a mapping of cases to controllers (it's not an elegant solution to the bugs we were experiencing from holding on to references to old controllers, but it got the job done).
It looks like this method is unused, so we can just delete it.
timeline.author: rcordovano

replies.bodyText: This was a left behind from trying to get things to work.  It has been removed.
replies.author: kellykelly3
